mapper.insert: insert into song_list (song_id, song_name, song_artist, song_language, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{songId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{songName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songArtist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{songLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update song_list set song_name = #{songName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, song_artist = #{songArtist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, song_language = #{songLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where song_id = #{songId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select song_id, song_name, song_artist, song_language, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from song_list where song_id = #{songId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select song_id, song_name, song_artist, song_language, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from song_list

SELECT song_id, song_name, song_artist, song_language, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM song_list
song_name LIKE "%"#{nameOrArtist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
OR song_artist LIKE "%"#{nameOrArtist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
